name: PearAI
long_description:
PearAI is an open source AI code editor. Think a better GitHub Copilot, or an open source Cursor. We're a fork of VSCode and Continue to maintain it's familiarity and functionalities, and add upon it the most seamless AI integration with all the top of the market models.

People who have been using it so far expressed that PearAI has up to 5x’d their work and development speed by having AI integrated features such as the ability to talk to your codebase directly. Students also said this accelerated their learning tremendously, with features like /leetcode and /sensei for beginner friendly tasks.

Long term, we aim to reduce the time it takes from idea to creation.

Why does open source matter for a code editor?

The moat is not in the AI models, the best model on the market will be used by any of these editors out there (except Copilot, which actually still uses GPT4 Turbo).

This means the true differentiators will be UI/UX, trust, transparency, community support, and distribution. These are all perfectly aligned with open source.

The PearAI project has around 49% of its commits made by contributors, spanning from our landing page, server and app itself. This helps speed up the development cycle. Code editors are the best products to be open source, because each developer are users themselves of the product! Not only is our code open source, us as founders, are “open source” as well! We post our entire development journey and life online, through our YouTube channels and Twitch livestreams (youtube.com/@FryingPan & youtube.com/@nang88). 

Try it out - we're sure you'll love it! Download and use for free at https://trypear.ai/download.

name: supercontrast
long_description: Supercontrast makes it easy for anyone to evaluate machine learning models. For example, we could help a small social media app find the best cloud solution for identifying hateful comments and deploy it the same day!
one_liner: Find the best ML model for your use case

name: Sandra.ai
long_description:
Sandra builds multilingual voice AI receptionists, specifically designed for car dealerships. It seamlessly handles customer calls—whether for appointments, service details, availability, or more—offering a natural, human-like experience 24/7. 

What sets Sandra apart is its deep integration with dealership management systems, allowing it to manage even the most complex queries. This ensures no calls or leads are missed, boosting both customer satisfaction and team efficiency.

The car dealership industry handles over 3 billion calls annually, with each call averaging 4 to 6 minutes. Traditional call centers charge between $1 and $2 per minute, depending on the complexity of the service. Thus, we estimate the total addressable market for inbound calls alone to exceed $26 billion a year. This does not even account for future opportunities in outbound calls.

Before launching Sandra, the founding team spent years working in the automotive and call center industries during their time at McKinsey. The three co-founders graduated in Data Science and AI from institutions like MIT, Ecole Polytechnique and HEC Paris.
one_liner: Sandra.ai builds the leading voice AI receptionist for car dealerships

name: Regatta Storage
long_description: Regatta Storage allows teams to access their S3 buckets as a local file system, saving 90% on storage costs. With Regatta, engineers can run data analytics directly on S3 -- eliminating data movement for these large data sets. For example, AI companies use Regatta to run their model training directly on data sets stored in S3. Regatta accelerates data access, so your applications experience optimized, local-like performance. Regatta's storage scales with your applications, and you only pay for what you use -- no need to guess how much storage or performance you need. With no complex configuration, you can set up Regatta in a single click.
one_liner: Transform S3 into a high-performance local disk

name: Dexter
long_description: Dexter is a no-code automation tool for ops team. For example, Dance, a European mobility company with over $11 million ARR, uses us to automate processes like resolving traffic tickets and accidents.
one_liner: No-code workflow automation for ops teams.

name: Bramble
long_description:
Bramble is an AI-powered real estate brokerage that provides end-to-end homebuying services for a simple flat fee. Set up tours, evaluate homes, submit offers, and close confidently - with on-demand support from expert agents and AI-backed tools when you need it.

We opened early access in CA and in a few weeks saw hundreds of sign-ups, several touring buyers, and have submitted multiple offers across the state - all with near-zero marketing spend. We just offered buyers what they really wanted: a high-quality experience for a reasonable price.
one_liner: AI-powered buyer real estate brokerage with a simple flat fee
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: HumanLayer
long_description: HumanLayer is an API and SDK that lets AI agents contact humans on slack/email when they need approval, feedback, or input. For example, if an AI Agent elects to send an email to a prospect or update production data, AI engineers can require human approval on that action.

name: Bifrost Orbital
long_description: Bifrost Orbital is building the SSH for satellites, i.e., creating a network of satellites to ensure continuous, real-time communication for other satellites in space. Our technology allows customers to monitor and control their satellites 24/7, just like accessing a computer remotely. We offer reliable, low-power, and backward-compatible solutions that work for both small and large spacecraft, making space operations more efficient and connected.
